name: Endure Island
description:
Basic Description

.You find yourself standing on an empty desert island.
On an ever-changing deserted island, just survive!
Use your weapons and items to fight your way through the changes on the desert island.

This game was created with the Unreal Engine, and the creation process up to Ver. 0.1 is available on YouTube as a video with explanations.
I hope it will be of some help to you in creating your own game.

Quests in Ver 0.2

In Ver0.2, one of the goals is to complete a quest.
At the end of that quest, a boss awaits you.
As the only boss in this version, it is a very powerful and mind-boggling enemy.
We urge you to try to defeat it!

Pickup


Various enemies
　Running zombies, jumping zombies, tree zombies, flying insects, goats that tell the player's location around them, and many more enemies will attack.

Obtaining weapons
　Guns are found on the map.
　If you want a stronger weapon, you can obtain it from the supply drops that often fall from the sky.
　The performance of the guns you pick up will vary from one individual to another, and depending on the conditions of the map, the guns may deteriorate, so look for better weapons.

Skills
　Learn skills to strengthen your character.
　Skill points can be obtained by defeating enemies.
　Skills and skill points are carried over to the next play.

Crafting
　Get the materials you need and craft to make the items you need.
　You can make bullets, recovery medicine, and other necessary items.

Night
　Be cautious at night, as zombies appear in greater numbers and become more active.

Mutants
　The map has special enemies called mutants.
　When mutants roam around, they change the environment and cause new enemies to appear.
　Find and defeat them as quickly as possible to delay the mutation of the enemies that appear.

Dangerous Plants
Flowers of pollution multiply poisonous mushrooms and aggravate the player's health.
Flowers of corrosion deteriorate the performance of guns and reduce the area for fighting bosses.

These can affect the entire island if left unchecked, so deal with them as soon as possible.

Premonition
Noise will tell you the direction of a serious problem, such as a mutant or polluting flower.
　Get your ears done and get to your destination.
　As you learn skills, the compass will also display your location.
